src_original: sarvāṇi ca me bhayānyapagatāni /  iti ato 'pi prāmodyabahulo bhavati /  tathā hyasya [suvi]niścitotpāditacittasya bodhisattvasya pañca bhayāni prahīṇāni bhavanti /
tgt_original: 「是菩薩得歡喜地，所有怖畏即皆遠離，所謂不活畏、惡名畏、死畏、墮惡道畏、大眾威德畏。

src_original: suparibhāvitanairātmyajñānasyātmasaṃjñā tāvan na pravartate /  kutaḥ punarasya ātma[sneho] vā upakaraṇasneho vā bhaviṣyati /  ato 'sya jīvikābhayaṃ na bhavati /
tgt_original: 何以故？ 是菩薩離我相故尚不貪身，況所用物，是故菩薩無不活畏。

src_original: na ca pareṣamantikātkiñcitpratikāṃkṣati /  evaṃkāmaśca bhavati /  mayaivaiṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvārthā upasaṃhartavyā iti /  ato 'sya aślokabhayaṃ na bhavati /
tgt_original: 心不希望恭敬供養，我應供養一切眾生供給所須，是故菩薩無惡名畏。

src_original: ātmadṛṣṭivigamāccāsyātma[vigama]saṃjñā na pravartate /  ato 'sya maraṇabhayaṃ na bhavati /
tgt_original: 遠離我見無我相故無有死畏。

src_original: maraṇāt me ūrdhvamāyatyāṃ niyataṃ buddhabodhisattvaiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti evaṃ niścito bhavati /
tgt_original: 又作是念，我若死已，所生必見諸佛菩薩。

src_original: ato 'sya durgatibhayaṃ na bhavati /
tgt_original: 是故無有墮惡道畏。

src_original: ṣaḍbhirākāraiḥ samāsatastathāgatā bodhisattvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākurvanti /
tgt_original: 《瑜伽》四十六說略由六相，蒙諸如來於無上正等菩提授與記別。

src_original: katamaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ /
tgt_original: 何等為六：

src_original: gotrasthamanutpāditacittam /  tathotpāditaṃ cittam sammukhāvasthitam /
tgt_original: 一安住種姓未發心位，二已發心位，三現在前位，四不現前位。

src_original: parimitaṃ kālamiyatā kālenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyata iti /
tgt_original: 五有定時限，謂爾所時當證無上正等菩提。

src_original: aparimitakālaṃ vyākurvanti na tu kālaniyama kurvanti /  (Dutt 197)  traya ime bodhisattvasya niyatipātāḥ /
tgt_original: 六無定時限，謂不宣說決定時限而與授記。

src_original: bhavyo 'sau pratyayānāsādya niyatamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
tgt_original: 一種姓定，遇緣便能證於正覺；

src_original: punarekatyo bodhisattvo niyataṃ cittamutpādayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na punastāvatpratyudāvartayati yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate
tgt_original: 二發心定，發大心已更不退轉；

src_original: punarbodhisattvo vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvāṃ sattvārthacaryāṃ yathecchati yathārabhate tathaivābandhyāṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 三不虛行，定得自在已於利有情終不空過。

src_original: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītyunuvyañjanāni catasraḥ sarvākārāḥ pariśuddhayaḥ
tgt_original: 三十二相者，依《大般若經》第三百八十一「佛言：

src_original: dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni katamāni /
tgt_original: 云何如來三十二相？

src_original: supratiṣṭhitapādo mahāpuruṣaḥ samamākramati mahīm /  idaṃ mahāpuruṣasya mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇam /
tgt_original: 善現！ 一世尊足下有平滿相，妙善安住猶如奩底，地雖高下隨足所蹈，皆悉坦然無不等觸。

src_original: adhasthātpādatalayoścakre jāte sahasrāre sanābhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrṇe /
tgt_original: 二世尊足下千輻輪文，輞轂眾相無不圓滿。

src_original: dīrghāṅgulimaṃhāpuruṣaḥ /  mṛdutaruṇapāṇipādaḥ /
tgt_original: 三世尊手足皆悉柔軟，如都羅綿勝過一切。

src_original: jālapāṇipādaḥ /  ucchaṅgacaraṇaḥ /  eṇeyajaṅghaḥ /
tgt_original: 四世尊手足一一指中間，猶如雁王咸有鞔網，金色交絡文同綺畫。

src_original: kośagatavastiguhyaḥ /  nyogradhaparimaṇḍalaḥ /
tgt_original: 八世尊雙腨漸次纖圓，如翳泥耶仙鹿王腨。 九世尊雙臂脩直𦟛圓，如象王鼻平立摩膝。 十世尊陰相勢峯藏密，其猶龍馬亦如象王。

src_original: ūrdhvāṅgaromā /  ekaikaromā /  ekaikamasya romakūpe jātaṃ nīlaṃ kuṇḍalakajātaṃ pradakṣiṇāvartam /
tgt_original: 十一世尊毛孔各一毛生，柔潤紺青右旋宛轉。

src_original: yathā paripākasamudāgamataḥ śraddhādīnāṃ pañcānāmindriyāṇāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātratā indriya-parāparatetyucyate /  paraśraddhāpūrvā dharmavicāraṇā-pūrvā ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrā ruciḥ pratyavagamaḥ nānādhimuktikatetyucyate /
tgt_original: 根者信等五根，此耎中上名為勝劣，於此正知名根勝劣智力。 若從他信以為其先，或觀諸法以為其先，成耎中上。

src_original: nānāgotravyavasthānam /  śrāvakapratyekabuddha-tathāgatagotrāṇāṃ rāgādicaritaprabhedanayena ca yāvadaśīti sattvacaritasahasrāṇi nānādhātukatetyucyate /  teṣāmevāvatāra-mukhānurūpā pratipat tadyathā rāgacaritānāmaśubhā vistareṇa tadyathā śrāvakabhūmau sarvatragāminī pratipadityucyate /  aparaḥ paryāyaḥ /
tgt_original: 愛樂勝解名種種勝解，於此正知名種種勝解智力。 若廣建立種種姓，或一乘或三乘或四乘或五乘，或貪瞋癡等分行等，乃至有情八十千行名種種界，界是姓故，於此正知名種種界智力。

src_original: sarvā pañcagatigāminī pratipatsarvatragāminītyucyate /  aparaḥ paryāya /  parasparaviruddheṣu nānāpakṣāśriteṣvanyonyarucidṛṣṭivipratyanīkavādiṣu pṛthagito bāhyakeṣu śramaṇabrāhmaṇeṣu yā pratipatsarvaprakārairihāmutrānavadyagāminītyucyate  tadyathā kāmasūtrādiṣu /
tgt_original: 若即如是諸趣門中隨順正行，如貪行者修不淨觀等名遍趣行，或趣一切五趣之行，或諸外道沙門婆羅門，各各異見品類諸行，或此世他世無罪趣行名遍趣行，於此正知名遍趣行智力，能於遍行諸趣之行而了知故，亦名遍行行。

src_original: vicitreṣu sattvanikāyeṣu tadyathā pūrveṣu dakṣiṇeṣu uttareṣu paścimeṣu nānā nāmasaṃketavyavasthānabhinneṣu  aṣṭāsu vyavahārapadeṣvanugataṃ pūrvakeṣvabhyatītevātmabhāveṣu ṣaḍvidhaṃ samāsataścaritamanusmaratyanekavidhaṃ  pūrvenivāse samanusmaran /
tgt_original: 若於種種有情眾中，四方名字假設安立品類差別，隨先過去所有自體八言說句：

src_original: aṣṭau vyavahārapadāni katamāni /  evaṃ nāmā /  evaṃ jātyaḥ /  evaṃ gotraḥ /  evamāhāraḥ /  evaṃ sukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī /
tgt_original: 一如是名，二生類，三種姓，四飲食，五受苦樂，六長壽，七久住，八壽量邊際。

src_original: evaṃ dīrghāyuḥ /  evaṃ cirasthitikaḥ /  evamāyuḥ paryanta iti /  (Dutt 269)  ṣaḍvyavahārapadavyaritāni katamāni /
tgt_original: 於此八中隨念六種略所行行，有無量種宿住隨念。
